nodes.text: This ballistic mesh jacket was the personal property of Mira, one of the Lost Jedi and companion of the Jedi Exile, during her career as a bounty hunter on the moon, Nar Shaddaa. An exceptionally protective jacket, it was comparable to medium armor, albeit much less restrictive, and protected its owner from various melee weapon damage.
In the game, only the playable character Mira can equip this article of clothing.
